stories.title: Building Open Source Network Security Tools: Components and Techniques

stories.text:
I'm graduating next year as SE, and since Covid I just see Senior jobs openings, increasingly the last two years. Why is that? 
Are big companies still hiring recent graduates? Where should I look at?
stories.title: Ask HN: What big companies (really) hire recent graduates?
Will Apple be the last US tech giant left in China?

stories.text:
Has anyone else faced this situation? 1. Your account gets locked due to "unusual activity". 2. You try to follow the process to unlocking it via SMS verification. 3. You receive a text with an unlock code. 4. Attempting to use the unlock code within 15 seconds of receiving it - either via copying and pasting, or entering it by typing in the numbers fails because the code is "incorrect or expired". 5. Not having another way to verify because your other way is e-mail but unfortunately your provider is Fastmail, who is currently getting DDOS'd / hacked or something =).

Could it be that Facebook is also getting attacked right now?
stories.title: Facebook's SMS account unlocker is not functioning
In defense of “Q-plasma” – a response to Sabine Hossenfelder
First real world photos of the new MacBook notch appear
Gartner: Citizen developers will soon outnumber professional coders 4 to 1
Trump's Truth Social Hacked Within Hours of Announcement
